strapiPost.title: New Fitness Franchise Coming to Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
Crunch Fitness, a worldwide fitness brand, is opening a new location in Fayetteville inside the Northwest Arkansas Mall with a planned winter launch date.

  • Something for everyone: Inside what used to be Sears, the 55,000 sqft facility will house $1m of equipment including weights, machines, a cardio zone, and more.
  • For less: With over 400 gyms across 4 continents, Crunch's $9.99 / mo price point on membership is accessible to more folks than traditional gym memberships.

Read more about the new location HERE.
